attributes.action: Establish an independent enquiry into insurance premiums having risen up to 100%
attributes.additional_details:
As the legislative assembly for the UK you have the power to introduce laws to protect the citizens of this country from unjust treatment at the hands greedy multinational corporations. A cap on premiums, force insurers to demonstrate how they have created each quote so that it can be reviewed and regulated.

Energy companies are forced to give breakdowns for where the energy comes from and how my costs are accrued, insurance companies should have to do the same.
attributes.background: In the space of 12 months car insurance premiums have almost doubled, with car insurance being a legal requirement in the UK insurance firms are able to charge whatever they like knowing we have to pay it. Investigate how the insurance companies are justifying this increase beyond pure greed.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this issue, which you might like to sign:

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
